media.caption: From Romney's victory speech, directed at Newt Gingrich, former House speaker
media.credit: Romney Wins In New Hampshire Republican Primary/New York Times
media.url: “In the last few days, we have seen some desperate Republicans join forces with him,” Romney said. “This is such a mistake for our party and for our nation. This country already has a leader who divides us with the bitter politics of envy.”

text.headline: New Hampshire
text.text: Romney swept New Hampshire from the other candidates, winning by a double-digit margin over Santorum and former Utah governor Jon M. Huntsman Jr.
